name: Dinner with Thomas
description:
A Quarter-Hour Quest of debt and dining for one player.

Yvonne's eldest sister was recently betrothed to Thomas, and soon after her second sister left to join them at Thomas's mansion. Stuck at home, Yvonne's been working to support herself and her father…and her father's gambling habit. But instead of another day of labor, today her father suggested she join her sisters for Dinner with Thomas.

Quarter-Hour Quests are short games that can be played through in 15 minutes. Drawing inspiration from short stories, computer role-playing games, and art games, they provide bite-sized gameplay for about the cost of a cup of coffee or short story.
